caption: A groovy funk track with slap bass, tight horn stabs, and rhythmic guitar scratching. Features a charismatic male lead vocal with call-and-response backing vocals, clavinet riffs, and an irresistible pocket groove that demands movement.
lyrics:
[Intro]

Uh! Get up!

[Verse 1]
Saturday night and the city's alive
Put on your dancing shoes it's time to arrive
The DJ's spinning and the floor is hot
Give me everything you got

[Pre-Chorus]
Can you feel it in your feet
Moving to that funky beat

[Chorus]
Get down, get funky tonight
Let the rhythm take you high
Get down, get funky with me
Set your body free
Ow!

[Verse 2]
Leave your troubles at the door
We came to party nothing more
The bass is thumping through the floor
Come on y'all let me hear you roar

[Pre-Chorus]
Can you feel it in your feet
Moving to that funky beat

[Chorus]
Get down, get funky tonight
Let the rhythm take you high
Get down, get funky with me
Set your body free

[Bridge]

Brass section take it!
Now bring it back!

[Verse 3]
We don't stop till the morning light
Keep on grooving feeling right
This is what we live for
Funk forever more

[Outro]
Get down! Get funky!
